name: Space Shooter (giuseppe0075)
description:
Space Shooter

Hi! This is one of my first game, I'm following a course about Unity and this was a game that i learned to do. In this game you will be a ship who have to destoy enemy's one as old style games in 2000th (and before!). Have fun and leave a feedback.

"WASD : move"

"Mouse left click to fire"
